title: Watch Face Night Diver
summary: Aarieer Night Diver Watch Face featuring Tritium radioactive photoluminescence.
description: Aarieer Night Diver is a true friend of divers featuring Tritium photoluminescence material, to provide clear date and time display even in thedarkest corners of the world. Aarieer engineers have put in tremendous effort into development of this watch in order to make the slightly radioactive Tritium safe to wear as well making the Watch Face waterproof. Compatible Watches:* All Android Wear watches (Moto 360, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R...)* Tested for different resolutions (320x320, 320x280, 400x400...)* Tested for square devicesFeatures:* Android Wear Watch Face* Tritium illuminated watch elements* Ambient mode supported (Black and white design to protect your OLED screen)Installation:Install the application and the Watch Face will be automatically visible on your compatible device. To activate the Watch Face, long press on your watch home page, look for the newly installed Watch Face and select it.Requirements:*Android Wear device 5.0.1 or higher*Android 5.0.1 or higher
descriptionHTML:
Aarieer Night Diver is a true friend of divers featuring Tritium photoluminescence material, to provide clear date and time display even in the
darkest corners of the world. Aarieer engineers have put in tremendous effort into development of this watch in order
to make the slightly radioactive Tritium safe to wear as well making the Watch Face waterproof.

Compatible Watches:
* All Android Wear watches (Moto 360, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R...)
* Tested for different resolutions (320x320, 320x280, 400x400...)
* Tested for square devices

Features:
* Android Wear Watch Face
* Tritium illuminated watch elements
* Ambient mode supported (Black and white design to protect your OLED screen)

Installation:
Install the application and the Watch Face will be automatically visible on your compatible device.
To activate the Watch Face, long press on your watch home page, look for the newly installed Watch Face and select it.

Requirements:
*Android Wear device 5.0.1 or higher
*Android 5.0.1 or higher
comments: Awesome watchface Really cool design and the configurable color is a neat feature.
